channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] VMware as a Service (vmware.directorsite)
item.description: Deploy a comprehensive portfolio of automated and on-demand services for VMware workloads to the cloud, faster than ever before.

item.title: [added] VMware Virtual Data Center (vmware.vdc)
item.description: Deploy a comprehensive portfolio of automated and on-demand services for VMware workloads to the cloud, faster than ever before.

item.title: [updated] DataStage (datastage) has changed the description of the plan named lite
item.description: *before*: IBM DataStage Lite Plan, *after*: IBM DataStage Lite Plan Lite plans are limited to 15 Capacity Unit-Hours per month. Lite plans are restricted so only one DataStage job can run at a time. Lite plan services are deleted after 30 days of inactivity.

item.title: [updated] Cloud Native Storage and Data Service (robin-storage) has a new plan named robin-storage-hourly-pay-as-you-go
